import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Col, Row, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { PencilSquare, Trash, PlusLg } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Axios from 'axios'; import '../style/ManageProduct.css' import { product } from '../data/product'; const ManageProduct = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('code'); const [keyword, setKeyword] = useState(''); const handleTerm = (event) => { setSearchTerm(event.target.value); if (event.target.value === 'category') { setKeyword('Rice'); } } const handleKeyword = (event) => { setKeyword(event.target.value); } return (

Manage Product

{searchTerm !== 'category' ? : }
{product .filter((item) => ( item[searchTerm].toLowerCase().includes(keyword.toLowerCase()) )) .map((item, idx) => (
{`id: ${item.id || idx}`}
{item.code} {item.title} {item.category} ))} ) } export default ManageProduct;
